title: ICE: `cannot relate bound region: ReLateBound(DebruijnIndex(2), BoundRegion {  ... } <= ReErased`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust struct Foo(T); impl<'a> Foo { type Assoc = &'a (); } fn bar(_: for<'a> fn(Foo::Assoc)>::Assoc)) {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.71.0-nightly (2f2c438dc 2023-05-08) binary: rustc commit-hash: 2f2c438dce75d8cc532c3baa849eeddc0901802c commit-date: 2023-05-08 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.71.0-nightly LLVM version: 16.0.2 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace
